publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-747 Karen Whitefield: Scottish Youth Parliament—That the Parliament congratulates those young people involved in establishing the Scottish Youth Parliament, a representative forum for young people from all parts of Scotland and all social backgrounds, which aims to provide the youth of Scotland with a strong and united voice with which to promote the rights of young people.
S1M-747 Scottish Youth Parliament (lodged on 5 April 2000) Scott Barrie*, Donald Gorrie*, Michael Russell*, Shona Robison*, Margaret Jamieson*
S1M-747 Scottish Youth Parliament (lodged on 5 April 2000) Fergus Ewing*, Brian Adam*
S1M-747 Scottish Youth Parliament (lodged on 5 April 2000) Alex Neil*, Irene Oldfather*

S1M-747 Karen Whitefield: Scottish Youth Parliament—That the Parliament congratulates those young people involved in establishing the Scottish Youth Parliament, a representative forum for young people from all parts of Scotland and all social backgrounds, which aims to provide the youth of Scotland with a strong and united voice with which to promote the rights of young people. Supported by: Scott Barrie, Donald Gorrie, Michael Russell, Shona Robison, Margaret Jamieson, Fergus Ewing, Brian Adam, Alex Neil, Irene Oldfather
S1M-747 Scottish Youth Parliament (lodged on 5 April 2000) Mr Adam Ingram*, Irene McGugan*, Trish Godman*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-747 Scottish Youth Parliament (lodged on 5 April 2000) Tricia Marwick*, Andrew Wilson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Johann Lamont*
S1M-747 Scottish Youth Parliament (lodged on 5 April 2000) Elaine Smith*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*

S1M-747 Karen Whitefield: Scottish Youth Parliament—That the Parliament congratulates those young people involved in establishing the Scottish Youth Parliament, a representative forum for young people from all parts of Scotland and all social backgrounds, which aims to provide the youth of Scotland with a strong and united voice with which to promote the rights of young people. Supported by: Scott Barrie, Donald Gorrie, Michael Russell, Shona Robison, Margaret Jamieson, Fergus Ewing, Brian Adam, Alex Neil, Irene Oldfather, Mr Adam Ingram, Irene McGugan, Trish Godman, Dr Elaine Murray, Nora Radcliffe, Tricia Marwick, Andrew Wilson, Mr Jamie Stone, Johann Lamont, Elaine Smith, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Pauline McNeill*

S1M-747 Karen Whitefield: Scottish Youth Parliament—That the Parliament congratulates those young people involved in establishing the Scottish Youth Parliament, a representative forum for young people from all parts of Scotland and all social backgrounds, which aims to provide the youth of Scotland with a strong and united voice with which to promote the rights of young people. Supported by: Scott Barrie, Donald Gorrie, Michael Russell, Shona Robison, Margaret Jamieson, Fergus Ewing, Brian Adam, Alex Neil, Irene Oldfather, Mr Adam Ingram, Irene McGugan, Trish Godman, Dr Elaine Murray, Nora Radcliffe, Tricia Marwick, Andrew Wilson, Mr Jamie Stone, Johann Lamont, Elaine Smith, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Pauline McNeill, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Mr Michael McMahon, Robert Brown, George Lyon, Cathy Jamieson, Robin Harper, Mike Watson*, Ms Sandra White*
